title: Australian football: fitness, skill, sportsmanship
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, John Kingsford-Smith, Bruce Andrew, Jack Hamilton and Fulton Muir
brief_description: Depicts important points of play in Australian Football and the need for fitness and training; excerpts from the 1969 Victorian Grand Final and the Interstate Football Carnival in Adelaide in 1969. Commentary by Brian Naylor.
